Question
========
Why do people mention the two-language problem?

Answerlist
----------
* Using two different languages for speed and prototyping
* Needing two monitors
* Two package managers
* Two versions of the same code

Solution
========
It refers to prototyping in one language and rewriting for performance in another.

Answerlist
----------
* True
* False
* False
* False
